TextView.android:text:
OpenSeizureDetector Locator will send a GeoSMS Text message containing the location of the phone when requested by someone sending a SMS Message containing a special password. 

The password is set using the 'Settings' button above.


If the phone receives a special GeoSMS text message it will display it on a map. I recommend using OsmAnd as this works without an internet connection (unlike Google Maps). 

Both of these features can be disabled in the settings screen if requred

For further information please see http://openseizuredetector.org.uk or contact graham@openseizuredetector.org.uk
